entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Mount Forest
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mount Forest 3:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
Temperature: -2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of ice pellets early this evening. Periods of ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to periods of snow mixed with ice pellets late this evening. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
